00020 
00021 RegisterFile::RegisterFile(QDomNode& registerNode): RegisterModel(registerNode),
00022 dim_(-1), addressOffset_(), typeIdentifier_(), range_(0), rangeAttributes_(),
00023 registerData_() {
00024 
00025         for (int i = 0; i < registerNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00026                 QDomNode tempNode = registerNode.childNodes().at(i);
00027 
00028                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:dim")) {
00029                         dim_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00030                 }
00031                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:addressOffset")) {
00032                         addressOffset_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00033                         addressOffset_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(addressOffset_);
00034                 }
00035                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:typeIdentifier")) {
00036                         typeIdentifier_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00037                         typeIdentifier_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(typeIdentifier_);
00038                 }
00039                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:range")) {
00040                         range_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00041                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, rangeAttributes_);
00042                 }
00043                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:register")) {
00044                         Register* reg = new Register(tempNode);
00045 
00046                         // if the map already contains register with same name
00047                         if (registerData_.contains(reg->getName())) {
00048                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Multiple registers with same"
00049                                                 " name in spirit:registerFile"));
00050                         }
00051                         // if name was available then add the register to map
00052                         else {
00053                                 registerData_.insert(reg->getName(), QSharedPointer<Register>(
00054                                                 reg));
00055                         }
00056                 }
00057                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:registerFile")) {
00058                         RegisterFile* reg = new RegisterFile(tempNode);
00059 
00060                         // if the map already contains register with same name
00061                         if (registerData_.contains(reg->getName())) {
00062                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Multiple registerFiles with same"
00063                                                 " name in spirit:registerFile"));
00064                         }
00065                         // if name was available then add the register to map
00066                         else {
00067                                 registerData_.insert(reg->getName(),
00068                                                 QSharedPointer<RegisterFile>(reg));
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071         }
00072 
00073         // if mandatory addressOffset is not defined
00074         if (addressOffset_.isNull()) {
00075                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory addressOffset missing in "
00076                                 "spirit:registerFile"));
00077         }
00078 
00079         // if mandatory range is missing
00080         if (range_ == 0) {
00081                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory range missing in spirit:"
00082                                 "registerFile"));
00083         }
00084         return;
00085 }
00086 
00087 RegisterFile::RegisterFile( const RegisterFile& other ):
00088 RegisterModel(other),
00089 dim_(other.dim_),
00090 addressOffset_(other.addressOffset_),
00091 typeIdentifier_(other.typeIdentifier_),
00092 range_(other.range_),
00093 rangeAttributes_(other.rangeAttributes_),
00094 registerData_() {
00095 
00096         for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> >::const_iterator i = 
00097              other.registerData_.begin();
00098                 i != other.registerData_.end(); ++i) {
00099                         if (i.value()) {
00100                                 Register* reg = dynamic_cast<Register*>(i.value().data());
00101                                 RegisterFile* regFile = dynamic_cast<RegisterFile*>(i.value().data());
00102                                 QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> copy;
00103 
00104                                 if (reg) {
00105                                         copy = QSharedPointer<RegisterModel>(
00106                                                 new Register(*reg));
00107                                 }
00108                                 else if (regFile) {
00109                                         copy = QSharedPointer<RegisterModel>(
00110                                                 new RegisterFile(*regFile));
00111                                 }
00112 
00113                                 if (copy)
00114                                         registerData_.insert(copy->getName(), copy);
00115                                 
00116                         }
00117         }
00118 }

00121 RegisterFile& RegisterFile::operator=( const RegisterFile& other ) {
00122         if (this != &other) {
00123                 RegisterModel::operator=(other);
00124 
00125                 dim_ = other.dim_;
00126                 addressOffset_ = other.addressOffset_;
00127                 typeIdentifier_ = other.typeIdentifier_;
00128                 range_ = other.range_;
00129                 rangeAttributes_ = other.rangeAttributes_;
00130 
00131                 registerData_.clear();
00132                 for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> >::const_iterator i = 
00133                  other.registerData_.begin();
00134                         i != other.registerData_.end(); ++i) {
00135                                 if (i.value()) {
00136                                         Register* reg = dynamic_cast<Register*>(i.value().data());
00137                                         RegisterFile* regFile = dynamic_cast<RegisterFile*>(i.value().data());
00138                                         QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> copy;
00139 
00140                                         if (reg) {
00141                                                 copy = QSharedPointer<RegisterModel>(
00142                                                         new Register(*reg));
00143                                         }
00144                                         else if (regFile) {
00145                                                 copy = QSharedPointer<RegisterModel>(
00146                                                         new RegisterFile(*regFile));
00147                                         }
00148 
00149                                         if (copy)
00150                                                 registerData_.insert(copy->getName(), copy);
00151 
00152                                 }
00153                 }
00154         }
00155         return *this;
00156 }

00162 void RegisterFile::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00163         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:registerFile");
00164 
00165         // write base class information
00166         RegisterModel::write(writer);
00167 
00168         // if optional spirit:dim is defined
00169         if (dim_ >= 0) {
00170                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:dim", QString::number(dim_));
00171         }
00172 
00173         // if mandatory addressOffset is not defined
00174         if (addressOffset_.isEmpty()) {
00175                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory addressOffset missing in "
00176                                 "spirit:registerFile"));
00177         }
00178         else {
00179                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:addressOffset", addressOffset_);
00180         }
00181 
00182         // if optional typeIdentifier is defined
00183         if (!typeIdentifier_.isEmpty()) {
00184                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:typeIdentifier", typeIdentifier_);
00185         }
00186 
00187         // if mandatory range is not defined
00188         if (range_ <= 0) {
00189                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory range missing in spirit:"
00190                                 "registerFile"));
00191         }
00192         else {
00193                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:range");
00194 
00195                 General::writeAttributes(writer, rangeAttributes_);
00196                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(range_));
00197 
00198                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:range
00199         }
00200 
00201         for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<RegisterModel> >::iterator i =
00202                         registerData_.begin(); i != registerData_.end(); ++i) {
00203                 i.value()->write(writer);
00204         }
00205 
00206         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:registerFile
00207 }
